text.graves.no_longer_protected: Ваша могила в %s (%s) содержащая %s предмет(ов) больше не защищена!
text.graves.expired: Ваша могила в %s (%s) содержащая %s предмет(ов) истекла!
text.graves.somebody_broke: Ваша могила в %s (%s) содержащая %s предмет(ов) была разрушена!
text.graves.created_at_expire: Создана могила в %s (%s). Она пропадёт через %s
text.graves.creation_failed: Couldn't create grave! Your items were dropped at %s (%s)
text.graves.creation_failed_void: Grave wasn't created, because you died in void!
text.graves.creation_failed_pvp: Grave wasn't created, because player killed you! Your items were dropped at %s (%s)
text.graves.creation_failed_claim: Grave wasn't created, because you were in a claim! Your items were dropped at %s (%s)
text.graves.damage_source_info.enabled: Enabled displaying of next damage sources! Type this command again to disable.
gamerule.universal_graves:protection_tim: Time of grave's protection against other players
